title: Start
body:
<<You>> 
*Escaping into the woods you run as fast as you can*
*This is until you run into a large figure, and fall over*
<<emotion sad>> 
<<UN>> 
Oh my God Are You Okay?
[[ Yeah… I’m okay |A]]
[[ Uhhh, is this real? |B]]
[[ GET AWAY FROM ME YOU MONSTER |C]]

title: A
body:
You had me worrying for a second!
<<addmeter 20>> 
[[2nd]]

title: B
body:
<<emotion normal>> 
Ok, you are really not ok...
[[2nd]]

title: C
body:
<<emotion angry>> 
It was an accident, I’m trying to help you!!
<<lessmeter 10>>
[[2nd]]

title: 2nd
body:
<<emotion normal>> 
Sorry that I knocked you over, it's just that……. I wanted to explore the island. You don’t look like you belong here.
[[Wha…..What are you?|third]]
[[HELPPPPP MEEEEE(goblin noise)|2B]]
[[I’m not sure how this is possible, but can you help me find the nearest exit?|2C]]

title: third
body:
<<happy>> 
<<emotion happy>>
<<tina>>
I’m a Tyrannosaurus, but you can call me Tina-Rex :3
<<You>>
uhhh hey there... I'm Robert.
I never knew they made you guys into humanoid creatures...
<<tina>>
<<emotion angry>>
Wait… Are you with them?
They held us in cages and experimented on us!!!
[[No, I’m just a visitor. They abandoned me when everything went wrong, I’m the real victim here.|3A]]
[[I didn’t know what they were actually doing here. I was here just to see the dinosaur, but now everything is not what it seems.|3B]]
[[Wait….Let me explain myself. I was invited here to see the exhibits, I’m guessing something went wrong. Please I got mixed up in all this|3C]]

title: 2B
body:
<<emotion mad>>
AHHHHHHHHHHHH MAKE IT STOP!!!!!!
<<chomp>> 
*CHOMP*
<<lessmeter 100>>
you shouldnt see this text youre DEAD

title: 2C
body:
I don’t know where that is, but it wouldn’t matter because they locked down everything.
<<addmeter 10>> 
[[third]]

title: 3A
body:
VICTIM??? They experimented on us, kept the ones that were docile. I'LL SHOW YOU HOW IT FEELS TO BE A VICTIM!
<<lessmeter 20>> 
<<emotion normal>> 
Sorry, I'm sure this is a stressful situation for the both of us.
[[4th]]

title: 3B
body:
<<emotion sad>> 
Your lucky that I feel sorry for you, but try anything and you will end up like the other.
<<addmeter 20>>
[[4th]]

title: 3C
body:
Exhibits??? I was created just so that I would live my life in a cage?
<<chomp>>
*She chomps you*
<<lessmeter 150>>
YOURE DEAD!!!

title: 4th
body:
Look, I want to explore the island and you want to leave here. We can do both if you agree that you will go with me to see other dinosaurs and the exhibits.
[[I take my chances|4A]]
[[I can agree to that, but why do you need me for it?|4B]]
[[Sooo.... It's a date?|4C]]

title: 4A
body:
<<emotion angry>> 
<<lessmeter 10>> 
You could, but you would be dead in a matter of minutes
[[end]]

title: 4B
body:
<<emotion happy>>
<<addmeter 5>>
You have the map and a key card to open every gate.
[[end]]

title: 4C
body:
<<addmeter 10>>
<<emotion love>>
Uhhh yeah
a- a date ;3
[[end]]

title: end
body:
<<emotion normal>>
<<You>>
*we began on our journey.*
*Hoping for the best.*
*But expecting the worse.*
<<end>>
end
